trans-unit.source: The <xref uid="langword_csharp_Information" name="Information" href=""></xref> module contains the procedures used to return, test for, or verify information.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_Information" name="Information" href=""> </xref>模块包含用于返回、 测试，或验证信息的过程。

trans-unit.source: This module supports the Visual Basic language keywords and run-time library members that provide error information, validate data, determine array bounds, and retrieve data type and color information.
trans-unit.target: 此模块支持的 Visual Basic 语言关键字和运行时库成员，它们提供的错误信息，验证数据、 确定数组界限，并检索数据类型和颜色信息。

trans-unit.source: Returns an integer indicating the line number of the last executed statement.
trans-unit.target: 返回一个整数，指示上次执行的语句的行号。

trans-unit.source: Read-only.
trans-unit.target: 只读。

trans-unit.source: If Visual Basic encounters no line numbers, it returns 0.
trans-unit.target: 如果 Visual Basic 遇到无行号，则返回 0。

trans-unit.source: Returns an integer indicating the line number of the last executed statement.
trans-unit.target: 返回一个整数，指示上次执行的语句的行号。

trans-unit.source: Read-only.
trans-unit.target: 只读。

trans-unit.source: Contains information about run-time errors.
trans-unit.target: 包含有关运行时错误的信息。

trans-unit.source: The properties of the `Err` object are set by the generator of an error—Visual Basic, an object, or the programmer.
trans-unit.target: 属性`Err`对象设置的错误生成器-Visual Basic、 对象或程序员。

trans-unit.source: When a run-time error occurs, the properties of the `Err` object are filled with information that uniquely identifies the error and that you can use to handle the error.
trans-unit.target: 运行时错误发生时，属性`Err`对象的唯一标识错误的信息填充，并可用于处理错误。

trans-unit.source: To generate a run-time error in your code, use the `Raise` method.
trans-unit.target: 若要在代码中生成运行时错误，请使用`Raise`方法。

trans-unit.source: The `Err` object's properties are reset to zero or zero-length strings ("") after an `Exit Sub`, `Exit Function`, `Exit Property`, or `Resume Next` statement within an error-handling routine.
trans-unit.target: `Err`对象的属性被重置为零个或零长度字符串 ("") 后`Exit Sub`， `Exit Function`， `Exit Property`，或`Resume Next`错误处理例程中的语句。

trans-unit.source: Using any form of the `Resume` statement outside of an error-handling routine will not reset the `Err` object's properties.
trans-unit.target: 使用任何形式的`Resume`语句在错误处理例程之外不会重置`Err`对象的属性。

trans-unit.source: You can use the `Clear` method to explicitly reset `Err`.
trans-unit.target: 你可以使用`Clear`方法来显式重置`Err`。

trans-unit.source: Use the `Raise` method rather than the `Error` statement to generate run-time errors for system errors and class modules.
trans-unit.target: 使用`Raise`方法而不是`Error`语句以生成运行时错误的系统错误，并类模块。

trans-unit.source: Your decision about whether to use the `Raise` method in other code depends on the richness of the information you want to return.
trans-unit.target: 你决定是否使用`Raise`中其他代码的方法取决于你想要返回的信息的丰富功能。

trans-unit.source: The `Err` object is an intrinsic object with global scope.
trans-unit.target: `Err`对象是具有全局作用域的内部对象。

trans-unit.source: Therefore, you do not need to create an instance of it in your code.
trans-unit.target: 因此，不需要在你的代码中创建它的实例。

trans-unit.source: Contains information about run-time errors.
trans-unit.target: 包含有关运行时错误的信息。

trans-unit.source: Returns a <xref uid="langword_csharp_Boolean" name="Boolean" href=""></xref> value indicating whether a variable points to an array.
trans-unit.target: 返回<xref uid="langword_csharp_Boolean" name="Boolean" href=""></xref>值，该值指示变量是否指向数组。

trans-unit.source: `IsArray` returns `True` if the variable points to an array; otherwise, it returns `False`.
trans-unit.target: `IsArray`返回`True`如果变量指向数组中; 否则，它将返回`False`。

trans-unit.source: `IsArray` is especially useful with objects that might contain arrays.
trans-unit.target: `IsArray`对于具有可能包含数组的对象尤其有用。

trans-unit.source: Required.
trans-unit.target: 必需。

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_Object" name="Object" href=""></xref> variable.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_Object" name="Object" href=""></xref>变量。

trans-unit.source: Returns a <xref uid="langword_csharp_Boolean" name="Boolean" href=""></xref> value indicating whether a variable points to an array.
trans-unit.target: 返回<xref uid="langword_csharp_Boolean" name="Boolean" href=""></xref>值，该值指示变量是否指向数组。

trans-unit.source: Returns a <xref uid="langword_csharp_Boolean" name="Boolean" href=""></xref> value indicating whether an expression represents a valid <xref uid="langword_csharp_Date" name="Date" href=""></xref> value.
trans-unit.target: 返回<xref uid="langword_csharp_Boolean" name="Boolean" href=""></xref>值，该值指示表达式是否表示有效<xref uid="langword_csharp_Date" name="Date" href=""></xref>值。

trans-unit.source: `IsDate` returns `True` if `Expression` is of the <xref:System.DateTime> data type or can be converted to it; otherwise, it returns `False`.
trans-unit.target: `IsDate`返回`True`如果`Expression`的<xref:System.DateTime>数据类型或可被转换为它; 否则为它将返回`False`。</xref:System.DateTime>

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.DateTime> data type holds both a date value and a time value.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.DateTime>数据类型支持的日期值和时间值。</xref:System.DateTime>

trans-unit.source: `IsDate` returns `True` if `Expression` represents a valid date, a valid time, or a valid date and time.
trans-unit.target: `IsDate`返回`True`如果`Expression`表示有效的日期、 有效的时间，或有效的日期和时间。

trans-unit.source: Required.
trans-unit.target: 必需。

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_Object" name="Object" href=""></xref> expression.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_Object" name="Object" href=""></xref>表达式。

trans-unit.source: Returns a <xref uid="langword_csharp_Boolean" name="Boolean" href=""></xref> value indicating whether an expression represents a valid <xref uid="langword_csharp_Date" name="Date" href=""></xref> value.
trans-unit.target: 返回<xref uid="langword_csharp_Boolean" name="Boolean" href=""></xref>值，该值指示表达式是否表示有效<xref uid="langword_csharp_Date" name="Date" href=""></xref>值。

trans-unit.source: Returns a <xref uid="langword_csharp_Boolean" name="Boolean" href=""></xref> value indicating whether an expression evaluates to the <xref href="System.DBNull"></xref> class.
trans-unit.target: 返回<xref uid="langword_csharp_Boolean" name="Boolean" href=""></xref>值，该值指示表达式的计算结果是否为<xref href="System.DBNull"></xref>类。

trans-unit.source: `IsDBNull` returns `True` if the data type of `Expression` evaluates to the <xref:System.DBNull> type; otherwise, `IsDBNull` returns `False`.
trans-unit.target: `IsDBNull`返回`True`如果的数据类型`Expression`计算结果为<xref:System.DBNull>类型; 否则为`IsDBNull`返回`False`。</xref:System.DBNull>

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.DBNull?displayProperty=fullName> value indicates that the `Object` represents missing or nonexistent data.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.DBNull?displayProperty=fullName>值，指示`Object`表示缺失或不存在的数据。</xref:System.DBNull?displayProperty=fullName>

trans-unit.source: `DBNull` is not the same as `Nothing`, which indicates that a variable has not yet been initialized.
trans-unit.target: `DBNull`不能与相同`Nothing`，指示尚未初始化变量。

trans-unit.source: `DBNull` is also not the same as a zero-length string (`""`), which is sometimes referred to as a null string.
trans-unit.target: `DBNull`也不是零长度字符串相同 (`""`)，这有时称为 null 字符串。

trans-unit.source: Required.
trans-unit.target: 必需。

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_Object" name="Object" href=""></xref> expression.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_Object" name="Object" href=""></xref>表达式。

trans-unit.source: Returns a <xref uid="langword_csharp_Boolean" name="Boolean" href=""></xref> value indicating whether an expression evaluates to the <xref href="System.DBNull"></xref> class.
trans-unit.target: 返回<xref uid="langword_csharp_Boolean" name="Boolean" href=""></xref>值，该值指示表达式的计算结果是否为<xref href="System.DBNull"></xref>类。

trans-unit.source: Returns a <xref uid="langword_csharp_Boolean" name="Boolean" href=""></xref> value indicating whether an expression is an exception type.
trans-unit.target: 返回<xref uid="langword_csharp_Boolean" name="Boolean" href=""></xref>值，该值指示表达式是否异常类型。

trans-unit.source: `IsError` returns `True` if the expression represents an `Object` variable that derives from the <xref:System.Exception> class in the <xref:System> namespace.
trans-unit.target: `IsError`返回`True`如果表达式表示`Object`派生自的变量<xref:System.Exception>类<xref:System>命名空间。</xref:System> </xref:System.Exception>

trans-unit.source: An exception that derives from <xref:System.Exception?displayProperty=fullName> can be caught with the `Try...Catch...Finally` statements.
trans-unit.target: 派生自的异常<xref:System.Exception?displayProperty=fullName>可捕获与`Try...Catch...Finally`语句。</xref:System.Exception?displayProperty=fullName>

trans-unit.source: Required.
trans-unit.target: 必需。

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_Object" name="Object" href=""></xref> expression.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_Object" name="Object" href=""></xref>表达式。

trans-unit.source: Returns a <xref uid="langword_csharp_Boolean" name="Boolean" href=""></xref> value indicating whether an expression is an exception type.
trans-unit.target: 返回<xref uid="langword_csharp_Boolean" name="Boolean" href=""></xref>值，该值指示表达式是否异常类型。

trans-unit.source: Returns a <xref uid="langword_csharp_Boolean" name="Boolean" href=""></xref> value indicating whether an expression has no object assigned to it.
trans-unit.target: 返回<xref uid="langword_csharp_Boolean" name="Boolean" href=""></xref>值，该值指示表达式是否具有分配给它没有任何对象。

trans-unit.source: `IsNothing` returns `True` if the expression represents an object variable that currently has no object assigned to it; otherwise, it returns `False`.
trans-unit.target: `IsNothing`返回`True`如果表达式表示的对象变量的当前未包含任何对象分配给它; 否则为它将返回`False`。

trans-unit.source: `IsNothing` is intended to work on reference types.
trans-unit.target: `IsNothing`旨在作用于引用类型。

trans-unit.source: A value type cannot hold a value of and reverts to its default value if you assign `Nothing` to it.
trans-unit.target: 值类型不能包含的一个值，和将恢复为其默认值，如果将分配`Nothing`到它。

trans-unit.source: If you supply a value type in `Expression`, `IsNothing` always returns `False`.
trans-unit.target: 如果提供中的值类型`Expression`，`IsNothing`始终返回`False`。

trans-unit.source: Required.
trans-unit.target: 必需。

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_Object" name="Object" href=""></xref> expression.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_Object" name="Object" href=""></xref>表达式。

trans-unit.source: Returns a <xref uid="langword_csharp_Boolean" name="Boolean" href=""></xref> value indicating whether an expression has no object assigned to it.
trans-unit.target: 返回<xref uid="langword_csharp_Boolean" name="Boolean" href=""></xref>值，该值指示表达式是否具有分配给它没有任何对象。

trans-unit.source: Returns a <xref uid="langword_csharp_Boolean" name="Boolean" href=""></xref> value indicating whether an expression can be evaluated as a number.
trans-unit.target: 返回<xref uid="langword_csharp_Boolean" name="Boolean" href=""></xref>值，该值指示表达式是否可以计算为数字。

trans-unit.source: `IsNumeric` returns `True` if the data type of `Expression` is `Boolean`, `Byte`, `Decimal`, `Double`, `Integer`, `Long`, `SByte`, `Short`, `Single`, `UInteger`, `ULong`, or `UShort`.
trans-unit.target: `IsNumeric`returns `True` if the data type of `Expression` is `Boolean`, `Byte`, `Decimal`, `Double`, `Integer`, `Long`, `SByte`, `Short`, `Single`, `UInteger`, `ULong`, or `UShort`.

trans-unit.source: It also returns `True` if `Expression` is a `Char`, `String`, or `Object` that can be successfully converted to a number.
trans-unit.target: 它还返回`True`如果`Expression`是`Char`， `String`，或`Object`可以成功转换为数字。

trans-unit.source: `Expression` can contain non-numeric characters.
trans-unit.target: `Expression`可以包含非数字字符。

trans-unit.source: `IsNumeric` returns `True` if `Expression` is a string that contains a valid hexadecimal or octal number.
trans-unit.target: `IsNumeric`返回`True`如果`Expression`是包含一个有效的十六进制或八进制数字的字符串。

trans-unit.source: `IsNumeric` also returns `True` if `Expression` contains a valid numeric expression that begins with a + or - character or contains commas.
trans-unit.target: `IsNumeric`也会返回`True`如果`Expression`包含有效的数值表达式开头 +、-字符或包含逗号。

trans-unit.source: `IsNumeric` returns `False` if `Expression` is of data type `Date`.
trans-unit.target: `IsNumeric`返回`False`如果`Expression`的数据类型`Date`。

trans-unit.source: It returns `False` if `Expression` is a `Char`, `String`, or `Object` that cannot be successfully converted to a number.
trans-unit.target: 它将返回`False`如果`Expression`是`Char`， `String`，或`Object`无法成功转换为数字。

trans-unit.source: Required.
trans-unit.target: 必需。

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_Object" name="Object" href=""></xref> expression.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_Object" name="Object" href=""></xref>表达式。

trans-unit.source: Returns a <xref uid="langword_csharp_Boolean" name="Boolean" href=""></xref> value indicating whether an expression can be evaluated as a number.
trans-unit.target: 返回<xref uid="langword_csharp_Boolean" name="Boolean" href=""></xref>值，该值指示表达式是否可以计算为数字。

trans-unit.source: Returns a <xref uid="langword_csharp_Boolean" name="Boolean" href=""></xref> value indicating whether an expression evaluates to a reference type.
trans-unit.target: 返回<xref uid="langword_csharp_Boolean" name="Boolean" href=""></xref>值，该值指示表达式的计算结果是否为引用类型。

trans-unit.source: `IsReference` returns `True` if `Expression` represents a reference type, such as a class instance, a `String` type, or an array of any type; otherwise, it returns `False`.
trans-unit.target: `IsReference`返回`True`如果`Expression`表示引用类型，如类实例，`String`类型或数组的任何类型; 否则，它将返回`False`。

trans-unit.source: A reference type contains a pointer to data stored elsewhere in memory.
trans-unit.target: 引用类型包含在其他位置存储在内存中数据的指针。

trans-unit.source: A value type contains its own data.
trans-unit.target: 值类型包含其自己的数据。

trans-unit.source: Required.
trans-unit.target: 必需。

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_Object" name="Object" href=""></xref> expression.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_Object" name="Object" href=""></xref>表达式。

trans-unit.source: Returns a <xref uid="langword_csharp_Boolean" name="Boolean" href=""></xref> value indicating whether an expression evaluates to a reference type.
trans-unit.target: 返回<xref uid="langword_csharp_Boolean" name="Boolean" href=""></xref>值，该值指示表达式的计算结果是否为引用类型。

trans-unit.source: Returns the lowest available subscript for the indicated dimension of an array.
trans-unit.target: 返回最小可用的指定维数的数组下标。

trans-unit.source: Since array subscripts start at 0, the lowest available subscript for every dimension is always 0.
trans-unit.target: 由于数组下标从 0 开始，每一维度最小可用下标始终是 0。

trans-unit.source: For an array with the following dimensions, `LBound` returns the values in the following table: ```vb# Dim a(100, 5, 4) As Byte ``` |Call to LBound|Return value| |--------------------|------------------| |`LBound(a, 1)`|0| |`LBound(a, 2)`|0| |`LBound(a, 3)`|0|
trans-unit.target: 对于具有以下维度的数组`LBound`下表中返回的值︰ ```vb# Dim a(100, 5, 4) As Byte ``` |调用 LBound |返回值 | |--------------------|------------------| |`LBound(a, 1)`|0| |`LBound(a, 2)`|0| |`LBound(a, 3)`|0|

trans-unit.source: Required.
trans-unit.target: 必需。

trans-unit.source: Array of any data type.
trans-unit.target: 任何数据类型的数组。

trans-unit.source: The array in which you want to find the lowest possible subscript of a dimension.
trans-unit.target: 要在其中查找维度最小可用下标的数组。

trans-unit.source: Optional.
trans-unit.target: 可选。

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_Integer" name="Integer" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_Integer" name="Integer" href=""></xref>.

trans-unit.source: The dimension for which the lowest possible subscript is to be returned.
trans-unit.target: 为返回最小可用下标维度。

trans-unit.source: Use 1 for the first dimension, 2 for the second, and so on.
trans-unit.target: 使用 1 表示第一个维度，为第二种，2，依此类推。

trans-unit.source: If `Rank` is omitted, 1 is assumed.
trans-unit.target: 如果`Rank`是省略，则假定为 1。

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_Integer" name="Integer" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_Integer" name="Integer" href=""></xref>.

trans-unit.source: The lowest value the subscript for the specified dimension can contain.
trans-unit.target: 指定维度的下标可以包含最小值。

trans-unit.source: always returns 0 as long as Array has been initialized, even if it has no elements, for example if it is a zero-length string.
trans-unit.target: 始终返回 0 长达 Array 已初始化，即使它不包含任何元素，例如，如果它是零长度字符串。

trans-unit.source: If Array is , throws an .
trans-unit.target: If Array is , throws an .

trans-unit.source: Array is .
trans-unit.target: Arrayis .

trans-unit.source: Rank less than 1, or Rank is greater than the rank of Array.
trans-unit.target: Rank小于 1，或Rank大于的秩Array。

trans-unit.source: Returns an <xref uid="langword_csharp_Integer" name="Integer" href=""></xref> value representing the RGB color code corresponding to the specified color number.
trans-unit.target: 返回<xref uid="langword_csharp_Integer" name="Integer" href=""></xref>值，该值表示与指定对应的 RGB 颜色代码颜色数。

trans-unit.source: Starting with the least-significant byte, the returned value specifies the red, green, and blue values used to set the appropriate color in the RGB system used by the Visual Basic language.
trans-unit.target: 从最低有效字节开始，返回的值指定用于在 Visual Basic 语言由使用的 RGB 系统中设置适当的颜色的红色、 绿色和蓝色值。

trans-unit.source: The `Color` argument has these settings.
trans-unit.target: `Color`自变量具有这些设置。

trans-unit.source: |Number|Color|Number|Color| |------------|-----------|------------|-----------| |0|Black|8|Gray| |1|Blue|9|Light blue| |2|Green|10|Light green| |3|Cyan|11|Light cyan| |4|Red|12|Light red| |5|Magenta|13|Light magenta| |6|Yellow|14|Light yellow| |7|White|15|Bright white|
Required.
trans-unit.target: 必需。

trans-unit.source: A whole number in the range 0–15.
trans-unit.target: 0-15 范围内的整数。

trans-unit.source: Returns an <xref uid="langword_csharp_Integer" name="Integer" href=""></xref> value representing the RGB color code corresponding to the specified color number.
trans-unit.target: 返回<xref uid="langword_csharp_Integer" name="Integer" href=""></xref>值，该值表示与指定对应的 RGB 颜色代码颜色数。

trans-unit.source: Color is outside of range 0 to 15, inclusive.
trans-unit.target: Color是范围 0 到 15 之间，非独占之外。

trans-unit.source: Returns an <xref uid="langword_csharp_Integer" name="Integer" href=""></xref> value representing an RGB color value from a set of red, green and blue color components.
trans-unit.target: 返回<xref uid="langword_csharp_Integer" name="Integer" href=""></xref>值，该值表示从一组的红色、 绿色和蓝色颜色组件的 RGB 颜色值。

trans-unit.source: Application methods and properties that accept a color specification expect that specification to be a number representing an RGB color value.
trans-unit.target: 应用程序方法和属性接受颜色规范预期规范是一个数字，表示 RGB 颜色值。

trans-unit.source: An RGB color value specifies the relative intensity of red, green, and blue to cause a specific color to be displayed.
trans-unit.target: RGB 颜色值指定相对的红色、 绿色和蓝色的导致要显示的特定颜色强度。

trans-unit.source: If the value for any argument to `RGB` is greater than 255, 255 is used.
trans-unit.target: 如果任何参数的值`RGB`大于 255，255 使用。

trans-unit.source: The following table lists some standard colors and the red, green, and blue values they include.
trans-unit.target: 下表列出一些标准颜色以及它们包括在红色、 绿色和蓝色值。

trans-unit.source: Required.
trans-unit.target: 必需。

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_Integer" name="Integer" href=""></xref> in the range 0–255, inclusive, that represents the intensity of the red component of the color.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_Integer" name="Integer" href=""></xref>0 – 255，（含)，范围内，它表示颜色中红色部分的强度。

trans-unit.source: Required.
trans-unit.target: 必需。

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_Integer" name="Integer" href=""></xref> in the range 0–255, inclusive, that represents the intensity of the green component of the color.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_Integer" name="Integer" href=""></xref>0 – 255，（含)，范围内，它表示颜色中绿色部分的强度。

trans-unit.source: Required.
trans-unit.target: 必需。

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_Integer" name="Integer" href=""></xref> in the range 0–255, inclusive, that represents the intensity of the blue component of the color.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_Integer" name="Integer" href=""></xref>0 – 255，（含)，范围内，它表示颜色中蓝色部分的强度。

trans-unit.source: Returns an <xref uid="langword_csharp_Integer" name="Integer" href=""></xref> value representing an RGB color value from a set of red, green and blue color components.
trans-unit.target: 返回<xref uid="langword_csharp_Integer" name="Integer" href=""></xref>值，该值表示从一组的红色、 绿色和蓝色颜色组件的 RGB 颜色值。

trans-unit.source: Green, Blue, or Red is outside of range 0 to 255, inclusive.
trans-unit.target: GreenBlue，或Red范围 0 到 255，之外。

trans-unit.source: Returns a <xref uid="langword_csharp_String" name="String" href=""></xref> value containing the system data type name of a variable.
trans-unit.target: 返回<xref uid="langword_csharp_String" name="String" href=""></xref>包含系统数据类型名称的变量值。

trans-unit.source: `SystemTypeName` returns the fully qualified common language runtime (CLR) type name corresponding to the Visual Basic type name.
trans-unit.target: `SystemTypeName`返回的完全限定公共语言运行时 (CLR) 类型名称对应于 Visual Basic 类型名称。

trans-unit.source: For example, if `VbName` contains "Date", `SystemTypeName` returns "System.DateTime".
trans-unit.target: 例如，如果`VbName`包含"日期"`SystemTypeName`返回"System.DateTime"。

trans-unit.source: If `SystemTypeName` does not recognize the value of `VbName`, it returns `Nothing` (not the string "Nothing").
trans-unit.target: 如果`SystemTypeName`无法识别的值`VbName`，它将返回`Nothing`(不是字符串"Nothing")。

trans-unit.source: Required.
trans-unit.target: 必需。

trans-unit.source: A <xref uid="langword_csharp_String" name="String" href=""></xref> variable containing a Visual Basic type name.
trans-unit.target: A <xref uid="langword_csharp_String" name="String" href=""> </xref>包含 Visual Basic 类型名称的变量。

trans-unit.source: Returns a <xref uid="langword_csharp_String" name="String" href=""></xref> value containing the system data type name of a variable.
trans-unit.target: 返回<xref uid="langword_csharp_String" name="String" href=""></xref>包含系统数据类型名称的变量值。

trans-unit.source: Returns a <xref uid="langword_csharp_String" name="String" href=""></xref> value containing data-type information about a variable.
trans-unit.target: 返回<xref uid="langword_csharp_String" name="String" href=""></xref>值，该值包含有关变量的数据类型信息。

trans-unit.source: The following table shows the `String` values returned by `TypeName` for different contents of `VarName`.
trans-unit.target: 下表显示`String`返回的值`TypeName`的不同内容`VarName`。

trans-unit.source: |`VarName` contents|String returned| |------------------------|---------------------| |16-bit `True` or `False` value type|"Boolean"| |8-bit binary value type|"Byte"| |16-bit character value type|"Char"| |64-bit date and time value type|"Date"| |Reference type indicating missing or nonexistent data|"DBNull"| |128-bit fixed-point numeric value type|"Decimal"| |64-bit floating-point numeric value type|"Double"| |32-bit integer value type|"Integer"| |Reference type pointing to an unspecialized object|"Object"| |Reference type pointing to a specialized object created from class *objectclass*|"*objectclass*"| |64-bit integer value type|"Long"| |Reference type with no object currently assigned to it|"Nothing"| |8-bit signed integer value type|"SByte"| |16-bit integer value type|"Short"| |32-bit floating-point numeric value type|"Single"| |Reference type pointing to a string of 16-bit characters|"String"| |32-bit unsigned integer value type|"UInteger"| |64-bit unsigned integer value type|"ULong"| |16-bit unsigned integer value type|"UShort"| If `VarName` is an array, the returned string can be any one of the strings in the preceding table with empty parentheses appended.
trans-unit.target: |`VarName`内容 |返回字符串 | |------------------------|---------------------| | 16 位`True`或`False`值类型 |"布尔"| | 8 位二进制值类型 |"字节"| | 16 位字符值类型 |"Char"| | 64 位日期和时间值类型 |"日期"| |引用类型，该值指示缺少或不存在数据 |"DBNull"| | 128 位定点数值类型 |"十进制"| | 64 位浮点型数值类型 |"双精度"| | 32 位整数值类型 |"整数"| |引用指向未专用化的对象类型 |"对象"| |引用指向从类创建专用的对象的类型*objectclass*|"*objectclass*"| | 64 位整数值类型 |"长"| |与当前分配给它没有任何对象引用类型 |"执行任何操作"| | 8 位有符号的整数值类型 |"SByte"| | 16 位整数值类型 |"短"| | 32 位浮点型数值类型 |"单个"| |引用指向 16 位字符的字符串类型 |"字符串"| | 32 位无符号的整数值类型 |"UInteger"| | 64 位无符号的整数值类型 |"ULong"| | 16 位无符号的整数值类型 |"UShort"| 如果`VarName`是一个数组，则返回的字符串可以是任何一种使用追加的空括号前面的表中的字符串。

trans-unit.source: For example, if `VarName` points to an array of integers, `TypeName` returns "Integer()".
trans-unit.target: 例如，如果`VarName`指向一个整数，数组`TypeName`返回"Integer()"。

trans-unit.source: When `TypeName` returns the name of a reference type such as a class, it returns only the name itself, not the qualified name.
trans-unit.target: 当`TypeName`返回引用类型的名称例如类，它将返回仅名称本身，而不是限定名称。

trans-unit.source: For example, if `VarName` points to an object of class <xref:System.Drawing.Printing.PaperSource?displayProperty=fullName>, `TypeName` returns "PaperSource".
trans-unit.target: 例如，如果`VarName`指向类的对象<xref:System.Drawing.Printing.PaperSource?displayProperty=fullName>，`TypeName`返回"PaperSource"。</xref:System.Drawing.Printing.PaperSource?displayProperty=fullName>

trans-unit.source: Note that if the variable is declared to be of a certain class type but does not have an object assigned to it, `TypeName` returns "Nothing".
trans-unit.target: 请注意，如果变量被声明为特定类类型的但没有向它分配、 对象`TypeName`返回"Nothing"。

trans-unit.source: Required.
trans-unit.target: 必需。

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_Object" name="Object" href=""></xref> variable.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_Object" name="Object" href=""></xref>变量。

trans-unit.source: If <xref uid="langword_csharp_Option Strict" name="Option Strict" href=""></xref> is <xref uid="langword_csharp_Off" name="Off" href=""></xref>, you can pass a variable of any data type except a structure.
trans-unit.target: 如果<xref uid="langword_csharp_Option Strict" name="Option Strict" href=""></xref>是<xref uid="langword_csharp_Off" name="Off" href=""> </xref>，你可以将变量传递的结构之外的任何数据类型。

trans-unit.source: Returns a <xref uid="langword_csharp_String" name="String" href=""></xref> value containing data-type information about a variable.
trans-unit.target: 返回<xref uid="langword_csharp_String" name="String" href=""></xref>值，该值包含有关变量的数据类型信息。

trans-unit.source: Returns the highest available subscript for the indicated dimension of an array.
trans-unit.target: 返回指定维度的数组的最高可用的下标。

trans-unit.source: Required.
trans-unit.target: 必需。

trans-unit.source: Array of any data type.
trans-unit.target: 任何数据类型的数组。

trans-unit.source: The array in which you want to find the highest possible subscript of a dimension.
trans-unit.target: 要在其中查找维度的最大可能下标的数组。

trans-unit.source: Optional.
trans-unit.target: 可选。

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_Integer" name="Integer" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_Integer" name="Integer" href=""></xref>.

trans-unit.source: The dimension for which the highest possible subscript is to be returned.
trans-unit.target: 为返回的最大可能下标维度。

trans-unit.source: Use 1 for the first dimension, 2 for the second, and so on.
trans-unit.target: 使用 1 表示第一个维度，为第二种，2，依此类推。

trans-unit.source: If `Rank` is omitted, 1 is assumed.
trans-unit.target: 如果`Rank`是省略，则假定为 1。

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_Integer" name="Integer" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_Integer" name="Integer" href=""></xref>.

trans-unit.source: The highest value the subscript for the specified dimension can contain.
trans-unit.target: 为指定维度的下标可以包含的最大值。

trans-unit.source: If Array has only one element, returns 0.
trans-unit.target: 如果 Array 具有只有一个元素， 返回 0。

trans-unit.source: If Array has no elements, for example if it is a zero-length string, returns -1.
trans-unit.target: 如果 Array 没有元素，例如，如果它是零长度字符串， 返回-1。

trans-unit.source: Array is .
trans-unit.target: Arrayis .

trans-unit.source: Rank is less than 1, or Rank is greater than the rank of Array.
trans-unit.target: Rank小于 1，或Rank大于的秩Array。

trans-unit.source: Returns an <xref uid="langword_csharp_Integer" name="Integer" href=""></xref> value containing the data type classification of a variable.
trans-unit.target: 返回<xref uid="langword_csharp_Integer" name="Integer" href=""></xref>值，该值包含变量的数据类型分类。

trans-unit.source: The integer value returned by `VarType` is a member of the <xref:Microsoft.VisualBasic.VariantType>.
trans-unit.target: 返回的整数值`VarType`是<xref:Microsoft.VisualBasic.VariantType>.</xref:Microsoft.VisualBasic.VariantType>的成员

trans-unit.source: The following table shows the values returned by `VarType` for special cases of `VarName`.
trans-unit.target: 下表显示返回的值`VarType`的特殊情况的`VarName`。

trans-unit.source: |Data type represented by `VarName`|Value returned by `VarType`| |----------------------------------------|---------------------------------| |[Nothing](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md)|`VariantType.Object`| |<xref:System.DBNull>|`VariantType.Null`| |Enumeration|Underlying data type (`SByte`, `Byte`, `Short`, `UShort`, `Integer`, `UInteger`, `Long`, or `ULong`)| |Array|Bitwise OR of array element type and `VariantType.Array`| |Array of arrays|Bitwise OR of `VariantType.Object` and `VariantType.Array`| |Structure (<xref:System.ValueType?displayProperty=fullName>)|`VariantType.UserDefinedType`| |<xref:System.Exception>|`VariantType.Error`| |Unknown|`VariantType.Object`|
trans-unit.target: |数据类型由`VarName`|返回值`VarType`| |----------------------------------------|---------------------------------| |[Nothing](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md)|`VariantType.Object`| |<xref:System.DBNull>|`VariantType.Null`| |枚举 |Underlying data type (`SByte`, `Byte`, `Short`, `UShort`, `Integer`, `UInteger`, `Long`, or `ULong`)| |数组 |按位或数组元素类型和`VariantType.Array`| |数组的数组 |按位或`VariantType.Object`和`VariantType.Array`| |结构 (<xref:System.ValueType?displayProperty=fullName>) |`VariantType.UserDefinedType`| |<xref:System.Exception>|`VariantType.Error`| |未知 |`VariantType.Object`|</xref:System.Exception></xref:System.ValueType?displayProperty=fullName></xref:System.DBNull>

trans-unit.source: Required.
trans-unit.target: 必需。

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_Object" name="Object" href=""></xref> variable.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_Object" name="Object" href=""></xref>变量。

trans-unit.source: If <xref uid="langword_csharp_Option Strict" name="Option Strict" href=""></xref> is <xref uid="langword_csharp_Off" name="Off" href=""></xref>, you can pass a variable of any data type except a structure.
trans-unit.target: 如果<xref uid="langword_csharp_Option Strict" name="Option Strict" href=""></xref>是<xref uid="langword_csharp_Off" name="Off" href=""> </xref>，你可以将变量传递的结构之外的任何数据类型。

trans-unit.source: Returns an <xref uid="langword_csharp_Integer" name="Integer" href=""></xref> value containing the data type classification of a variable.
trans-unit.target: 返回<xref uid="langword_csharp_Integer" name="Integer" href=""></xref>值，该值包含变量的数据类型分类。

trans-unit.source: Returns a <xref uid="langword_csharp_String" name="String" href=""></xref> value containing the Visual Basic data type name of a variable.
trans-unit.target: 返回<xref uid="langword_csharp_String" name="String" href=""></xref>包含 Visual Basic 数据类型名称的变量值。

trans-unit.source: `VbTypeName` returns the Visual Basic type name corresponding to the common language runtime type name.
trans-unit.target: `VbTypeName`返回与公共语言运行时类型名称对应的 Visual Basic 类型名称。

trans-unit.source: For example, if `UrtName` contains "Int32" or "System.Int32", `VbTypeName` returns "Integer".
trans-unit.target: 例如，如果`UrtName`包含"Int32"或"System.Int32"`VbTypeName`返回"整数"。

trans-unit.source: If `VbTypeName` does not recognize the value of `UrtName`, it returns `Nothing` (not the string "Nothing").
trans-unit.target: 如果`VbTypeName`无法识别的值`UrtName`，它将返回`Nothing`(不是字符串"Nothing")。

trans-unit.source: The type name in `UrtName` can be obtained from various sources, for example from the <xref:System.Reflection.MemberInfo.Name%2A> property in the <xref:System.Reflection.MemberInfo> array of the <xref:System.Type> class.
trans-unit.target: 中的类型名称`UrtName`可从各种源，例如从<xref:System.Reflection.MemberInfo.Name%2A>属性<xref:System.Reflection.MemberInfo>的<xref:System.Type>类。</xref:System.Type>数组</xref:System.Reflection.MemberInfo>中</xref:System.Reflection.MemberInfo.Name%2A>获取

trans-unit.source: Required.
trans-unit.target: 必需。

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_String" name="String" href=""></xref> variable containing a type name used by the common language runtime.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_String" name="String" href=""></xref>包含由公共语言运行时类型名称的变量。

trans-unit.source: Returns a <xref uid="langword_csharp_String" name="String" href=""></xref> value containing the Visual Basic data type name of a variable.
trans-unit.target: 返回<xref uid="langword_csharp_String" name="String" href=""></xref>包含 Visual Basic 数据类型名称的变量值。
